name: ExplosionEvent
description: ExplosionEvent triggers when an explosion happens in the world. ExplosionEvent.Start is fired before the explosion actually occurs. ExplosionEvent.Detonate is fired once the explosion has a list of affected blocks and entities. ExplosionEvent.Start is Cancelable . ExplosionEvent.Detonate can modify the affected blocks and entities. Children do not use HasResult . Children of this event are fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
